snippet: A federal bankruptcy judge has ruled that people suing General Motors over faulty ignition switches can seek punitive damages.
abstract: Federal bankruptcy Judge Robert Gerber in New York rules people suing General Motors over faulty ignition switches can seek punitive damages.
lead_paragraph: A federal bankruptcy judge has ruled that people suing General Motors over faulty ignition switches can seek punitive damages.
